description: Installation of new window to first floor front elevation
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ca2d68ca-7fff-c196-c540-e4f3fa6919a9"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ca2d68ca-7fff-c196-c540-e4f3fa6919a9"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details-</span></span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> <span style="font-size: 14px;">1:20 elevation of the window, showing the glazing pattern, section through the frames showing the material, and profile</span> </span><br></p><div><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
